content: You are good at finding the object in a 3D scene based on a given query description.

These images show different views of a room. You need to find the trash can in this query description: "the trash can is located along the far wall of the room. the trash can is also directly to the right of the toilet and underneath the toilet paper.". 
Please review all view images to find the target object and select the view that you can see the target object most clearly. 
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified the target object, and why you choose this view.
"view": The number of the view is in the top left corner of the corresponding image. e.g., "view": "2"

The description states that the trash can is located along the far wall of the room, directly to the right of the toilet, and underneath the toilet paper. In view 0, the layout of the room is visible from above, showing the toilet and the area to its right. This view allows us to see the positioning of objects relative to the toilet, making it easier to identify the trash can in the specified location.
